basic.description: A comprehensive introduction to the major theories and empirical studies of consumer culture with emphasis upon the historical, socioeconomic, and cultural aspects of consumption in sociological context; substantive focus upon diverse topics such as food, tourism, the home, children, and marketing.
basic.subject: SOCY
basic.title: Consumer Culture

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    A Grade of C- in SOCY 122/6.0.
